wikipedia_page.main: Lord Robert Montagu PC (24 January 1825 – 6 May 1902) was a British Conservative politician. He served as Vice-President of the Committee on Education between 1867 and 1868.

response: * Lord Robert Montagu (1825–1902), married Ellen Cromie and Elizabeth Wade and had issue.
